page.title: 07SMITH'S GREEN FARM part 1
page.content: {Smith's Green Farm}is owned and managed by{Mr. Graves.}It is on the road between Debden and Thaxted. They have{135 acres}of land in total. There is no livestock on the farm with the exception of chickens. There is no grazing land. The main crop is{wheat but{peas, sugarbeet, spring barley}and a little{fruit}is grown also. There are five different fields and the crops are rotated among these. The rotation is wheat; wheat; sugarbeet; spring barley; wheat and wheat. Mr Graves has two ploughs and four tractors each{tractor}has a working {life}of{12-15 years.}The wheat when it is harvested must be dried. The sun is preferable for this, but in cases of extreme bad weather there is a drying machine. The corn goes to{intervention {(the grain mountain)}the sugarbeet to the sugarbeet factory ....(cont pg 8)
